text: Caroline Wozniacki defeated Elena Vesnina in the final 6–2, 6–3 to win the Women's Singles tennis title at the 2011 Charleston Open. Samantha Stosur was the defending champion, but lost to Vesnina in the third round. ==Seeds== The top eight seeds received a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==Qualifying== ===Players=== ====Seeds==== ====Qualifiers==== ===Qualifying draw=== ====First qualifier==== ====Second qualifier==== ====Third qualifier==== ====Fourth qualifier==== ====Fifth qualifier==== ====Sixth qualifier==== ====Seventh Qualifier==== ====Eighth Qualifier==== ==References== * Qualifying Draw *Main draw *Qualifying singles Family Circle Cup - Singles Category:Charleston Open
title: 2011 Family Circle Cup – Singles
